title: Amida-do dayori - Letter from the Mountain (2002 - Japan) subs
description:
Amida-do dayori (2002 - Japan)                   Letter from the Mountain

Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0283878/


6 Award WINS and 11 Award NOMINATIONS

Highly specialized doctor Michiko finds herself seized with panic attacks. She and her partner, Takao, decide to leave behind their stressful lives in Tokyo for a simpler life in the small farming village of Shinshu. After meeting several sick people in the community, Michiko sets up a medical center and gradually heals herself in the process. However, many of the townspeople refuse medical treatment, preferring to let nature take its course. The conclusion involves an annual celebration suggesting the couple's acceptance in the community.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 692x444, 23.976 fps, 1750 Kbps, 02h08m30s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 256 kbps

DVDRip, Japanese audio, optional subtitles English, French, Japanese
